title: Engraved on the wedding invitation...
content:
I've got an invitation from my friend and was absolutely impressed by the work the printer did on it. Very decent, with steel engraving and matching envelopes for the reply. Nice paper too.  
The following type has drawn my attention and I wonder if someone can tell me what this is

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013210835im_/http:/typophile.com/files/marriage_type.jpg)

Cheers,  
Alex
author: popovich

comments.content:
I don't think this is what you are looking for but the calligraphic style which drawn your attention it is called Chancery or Cancelleresca.

Regards,  
AS
